mapper.sql: course.*, user.*, school.*, f1.file_url as study_course_img, f2.file_url as teacher_img, course_type.* from course left join user on course.course_teacher_id = user.user_id left join school on user.user_school = school.school_id left join file f1 on course.course_img = f1.file_id left join file f2 on user.user_img = f2.file_id left join course_type on course.course_type_id = course_type.course_type_id

study.*, course.*, course_type.*, u1.user_id as study_user_id, u1.user_name as study_user_name, u1.user_sex as study_user_sex, u1.birthday as study_birthday, u1.user_email as study_user_email, u1.user_education as study_user_education, u1.user_school as study_user_school, u1.user_intro as study_user_intro, u1.note as study_note, u1.user_phone as study_user_phone, u1.user_type as study_user_type, s1.school_id as study_school_id, s1.school_name as study_school_name, s1.school_code as study_school_code, s1.school_depart as study_school_depart, s1.school_location as study_achool_location, s1.school_level as study_school_level, s1.school_type as study_school_type, u2.*, s2.*, f1.file_url as study_user_img, f2.file_url as teacher_img, f3.file_url as study_course_img from study left join course on study.study_course_id = course.course_id left join user u1 on study.study_user_id = u1.user_id left join school s1 on u1.user_school = s1.school_id left join user u2 on course.course_teacher_id = u2.user_id left join school s2 on u2.user_school = s2.school_id left join file f1 on u1.user_img = f1.file_id left join file f2 on u2.user_img = f2.file_id left join file f3 on course.course_img = f3.file_id left join course_type on course.course_type_id = course_type.course_type_id

lesson.*, course.*, user.*, school.*, f1.file_url as study_course_img, f2.file_url as teacher_img, course_type.* from lesson inner join course on lesson.lesson_course_id = course.course_id left join user on course.course_teacher_id = user.user_id left join school on user.user_school = school.school_id left join file f1 on course.course_img = f1.file_id left join file f2 on user.user_img = f2.file_id left join course_type on course.course_type_id = course_type.course_type_id
